data.meta_description: Canadas Best Value Inn is now part of Sonesta Hotels. Explore the hotel and book your stay in St. Catharines directly and hassle free!
data.text:
Cozy Stays At Affordable Rates

Welcome to Canadas Best Value Inn St. Catharines, conveniently located off of Queen Elizabeth Way and Ontario Street exit 47. We are less than 15 minutes from Niagara Falls. St. Catharines lies on the shore of Lake Ontario. Stay connected with free wireless Internet access in our guest rooms. Enjoy free coffee and tea in our lobby. Step into the privacy of your own guest room with amenities including a microwave, mini-fridge, cable TV with ESPN and Showtime, desk with lamp, iron, ironing board, free local calls, and wake-up service. Children age 16 and younger stay free in their parent's room with existing bedding. Dogs are welcome for a small nightly charge.

Known as Garden City, St. Catharines boasts a wealth of family fun such as swimming, biking, fishing, parks, lakes, gardens, and lastly, historic downtown. Our St. Catharines hotel is near several local attractions such as the Morningstar Mill, Garden City Arena, Port Dalhousie, St. Catharines Museum, Welland Canals Centre, and Short Hills Provincial Park. Hit the links at Fairview Golf and Mini Putt. Check out a flick at Empire Studio 8 Penn Centre and Empire Theatres - Empire Theatres Pen Centre. Sit down to a delicious dinner at one of the local restaurants such as Wildfire Grill House and Lounge, Canton Restaurant, or Joey's Seafood Restaurants.
